title: Sensex Soars on Positive Economic Data
story: The Sensex witnessed a remarkable surge, gaining over 500 points driven by positive economic data, robust GDP growth figures, and a decline in inflation rates.

title: Tech Giants Lead Market Gains
story: Shares of major technology companies like TCS, Infosys, and Wipro led the market gains, fueled by strong quarterly results and optimism surrounding digital transformation initiatives.

title: Banking Stocks Rally on RBI Rate Hike
story: Major lenders like SBI, ICICI Bank, and HDFC Bank witnessed significant gains as investors anticipated improved profitability due to higher interest rates after the RBI hiked interest rates.

title: Sensex Soars on Positive Economic Data
story: The Sensex witnessed a remarkable surge, gaining over 500 points driven by positive economic data, robust GDP growth figures, and a decline in inflation rates.

title: Pharma Stocks Shine on Export Opportunities
story: Pharmaceutical companies like Sun Pharma, Dr. Reddy's, and Cipla saw their shares surge due to growing export opportunities in the global healthcare market and optimism about drug approvals.

title: Auto Stocks Rev Up on EV Demand
story: Shares of major automakers like Tata Motors, Maruti Suzuki, and Mahindra & Mahindra gained ground driven by increasing demand for electric vehicles and government incentives for the EV sector.
